means: 懒洋洋地躺着[坐着、站着]
懒洋洋地坐着（或躺着、站着）

sentence.Network_en: The dog let its tongue loll out.
You shouldn't have so many guests in front loll out tongue.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不该在这么多的客人面前伸舌头.

sentence.Network_en: Price cut inevitable as new crop available soon loll off until notice.
sentence.Network_cn: 新的谷物即将上市,价格降低在所难免,请稳住另候通知.

PerfectNetExp.abs: loll out 伸出loll 倚靠lollapalooza 非常出色的人
雅思词汇词根+联想记忆法 ... logic n. 逻辑,逻辑学,条理性 loll v. 懒洋洋地倚靠,(头等)垂下; look after 照顾.
以l开头的英语英文单词 ... loiter 游荡，走走停停 loll 懒洋洋地坐或卧 london 伦敦(英国首都).
雅思易混单词 - 豆丁网 ... a lucre 收益， 钱财 loll 懒洋洋 lull 麻痹， 使安静.

list.abs: And the dismal remains , with lolling head ., 阴沉的尸体 , 下垂的头颅.
loiter 闲荡loll out 伸出loll 倚靠
the dog lolled its tongue out这狗伸出了舌头
lolley needle 一种短锥或绳针lolling range 负稳性倾侧范围lolly 片冰

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: probably symbolic of dangling

entry.def: If you loll somewhere, you sit or lie in a very relaxed position.

example.ex: He was lolling on the sofa in the shadows near the fire...
example.tran: 他懒洋洋地躺在炉火边一个背光的沙发上。

example.ex: He lolled back in his comfortable chair.
example.tran: 他懒洋洋地靠在舒适的椅子上。

entry.def: If something fairly heavy, especially someone's head or tongue, lolls, it hangs down in a loose, uncontrolled way.

example.ex: When he let go the head lolled sideways...
example.tran: 他一放手，脑袋便垂向一侧。

example.ex: His tongue was lolling out of the side of his mouth...
example.tran: 他的舌头从嘴角耷拉出来。

means.word_mean: 懒洋洋地坐着(或躺着、站着)；无所事事

sentences.en: There were several kids lolling around outside the club.
sentences.cn: 有几个小孩在俱乐部外面闲荡。

sentences.en: Jim should get a job instead of lolling around the house all day.
sentences.cn: 吉姆应该找份工作，不要成天闲在家里。
